parameters.definition: Maximum ratio of number of trucks to number of containers
Minimum total units of oil to send to the port
Minimum number of containers to use

description: An oil and gas company is sending their oil to the port using containers and trucks. A container can hold \param{ContainerCapacity} units of oil while a truck can hold \param{TruckCapacity} units of oil. Due to government restrictions, the number of trucks used has to at most \param{TruckContainerRatio} times the number of containers used. If at least \param{MinimumUnits} units of oil need to be sent to the port and at least \param{MinimumContainers} containers need to be used, minimize the total number of containers and trucks needed.
